creator: rwdurham@hotmail.com
text:
As Downloaded:
<!DOCTYPE taglib
  PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD JSP Tag Library 1.1//EN"
  "http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-jsptaglib_1_1.dtd">
Changed to:
<!DOCTYPE taglib
   PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD JSP Tag Library 1.1//EN"
   "http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-jsptaglibrary_1_1.dtd">
The tld has been updated with the correct DTD.  Thanks for reporting this.
creator: glenn@apache.org
